attributes.action: Start a petition to stop the government adding fluoride to our drinking water
attributes.additional_details: Nobody should be forced to have medication in their drinking water.
attributes.background:
To look into scientific research that has been carried out regarding the effects of Fluoride.
to look into the work stephen Peckham, director of the Centre for Health Service Studies at the University of Kent and others that have published their research on fluoride

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

For more information see:
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/fluoride/
https://publichealthmatters.blog.gov.uk/2016/04/13/water-fluoridation-what-it-is-and-how-it-helps-dental-health/
